医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
消除儿童贫困是改善儿童健康的关键《流行病学杂志》在线发表的研究发现，从现在到 2033 年，英格兰继续努力减少儿童贫困，例如取消儿童福利中的两个孩子限制，将显着改善儿童健康的多个方面并缩小全国范围内的健康不平等现象与社区健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Ending-child-poverty-key-to-improving-child-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Ending-child-poverty-key-to-improving-child-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1ef50b5-5310-4403-af7d-f53c9e14a4c4 Wed, 07 Aug 2024 00:19:45 -0400 Ending child poverty key to improving child health
人造石台面严重危害健康现在可能是时候禁止人造石了——；英国厨房台面的最爱——； 《Thorax》杂志上的一组医生在治疗英国报道的首批 8 例人造石硅肺病病例后表示，为了避免因制造和安装而引起的无法治愈的肺部疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Artificial-stone-worktops-pose-serious-health-hazard.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Artificial-stone-worktops-pose-serious-health-hazard.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=88cbcabd-0a72-413a-af32-a611a2354615 Wed, 07 Aug 2024 00:13:24 -0400 Artificial stone worktops pose serious health hazard
研究揭示了某些脑细胞在阿尔茨海默病斑块形成中的作用《自然神经科学》杂志上的一项研究发现，神经元和少突胶质细胞都会导致阿尔茨海默病中淀粉样蛋白-β斑块的负担，强调了新的治疗靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Study-uncovers-roles-of-certain-brain-cells-in-Alzheimers-plaque-formation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Study-uncovers-roles-of-certain-brain-cells-in-Alzheimers-plaque-formation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3232a9c8-ccbb-4ea5-856f-3988047d1bfb Wed, 07 Aug 2024 00:10:00 -0400 Study uncovers roles of certain brain cells in Alzheimer's plaque formation
肿瘤微环境中肝癌干细胞与免疫细胞的相互作用肿瘤微环境（TME）内肝癌干细胞（CSC）和免疫细胞之间的复杂动态是肝癌进展的核心。这些相互作用对于创建显着影响免疫治疗反应的免疫抑制环境至关重要。肝脏 CSC 负责肿瘤的发生、转移、治疗耐药和复发，表现出异质性，并具有各种表面标志物，这些标志物有助于其干细胞性和转移潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/The-interplay-of-liver-cancer-stem-cells-and-immune-cells-in-tumor-microenvironment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/The-interplay-of-liver-cancer-stem-cells-and-immune-cells-in-tumor-microenvironment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51214faf-82eb-4ca9-b041-ada6a5f11a24 Wed, 07 Aug 2024 00:07:12 -0400 The interplay of liver cancer stem cells and immune cells in tumor microenvironment
新研究表明，在线社区提供支持，但也存在许多风险《传播心理学》的一篇评论探讨了加入数字社区的动机和各种影响，强调了支持和预防的风险和机遇。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Online-communities-offer-support-but-come-with-many-risks-says-new-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Online-communities-offer-support-but-come-with-many-risks-says-new-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bbf72a79-19f1-4b15-98f7-841f884f0a55 Tue, 06 Aug 2024 23:51:00 -0400 Online communities offer support but come with many risks, says new study
含有益生菌和蜂蜜的酸奶可以增强肠道细菌，但对消化或认知没有好处《营养杂志》上的一项研究发现，含有动物双歧杆菌和蜂蜜的酸奶可以提高益生菌水平，但不会影响消化、认知或情绪。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Yogurt-with-probiotics-and-honey-boosts-gut-bacteria-but-no-digestive-or-cognitive-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Yogurt-with-probiotics-and-honey-boosts-gut-bacteria-but-no-digestive-or-cognitive-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=422d9102-e769-46f1-be0d-304d95234d94 Tue, 06 Aug 2024 23:04:00 -0400 Yogurt with probiotics and honey boosts gut bacteria but no digestive or cognitive benefits
研究揭示气候变化对肠道病毒爆发的影响手足口病 (HFMD) 会导致幼儿发烧和皮疹，通常发生在夏季。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Study-reveals-impact-of-climate-change-on-enterovirus-outbreaks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Study-reveals-impact-of-climate-change-on-enterovirus-outbreaks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=155c2607-1a11-4f6e-a45c-a224520f7dc2 Tue, 06 Aug 2024 23:01:41 -0400 Study reveals impact of climate change on enterovirus outbreaks
检查影响肥胖风险的社会和结构因素肥胖在美国是一种流行病。在过去的二十年里，所有种族和民族的成年人中，这种情况都在增加；然而，根据美国国立卫生研究院的数据，非西班牙裔黑人成年人、西班牙裔成年人、美洲印第安人或阿拉斯加原住民成年人的肥胖率高于白人和亚洲人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Examining-social-and-structural-factors-influencing-obesity-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Examining-social-and-structural-factors-influencing-obesity-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=496b4755-3c16-433f-8ae8-347af92b5d4a Tue, 06 Aug 2024 22:57:15 -0400 Examining social and structural factors influencing obesity risk
研究揭示 TREM2 R47H 突变如何影响阿尔茨海默病斑块由加州大学欧文分校领导的研究人员发现，TREM2 R47H 基因突变如何导致某些大脑区域产生异常蛋白团块，称为 β-淀粉样斑块，与迟发性阿尔茨海默病相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Study-uncovers-how-TREM2-R47H-mutation-affects-Alzheimers-plaques.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Study-uncovers-how-TREM2-R47H-mutation-affects-Alzheimers-plaques.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d934e9af-9b59-4a99-aae7-3099479aadd8 Tue, 06 Aug 2024 22:53:26 -0400 Study uncovers how TREM2 R47H mutation affects Alzheimer's plaques
FDA 批准 vorasidenib 治疗 IDH 突变 2 级神经胶质瘤Vorasidenib 已获得美国食品和药物管理局 (FDA) 批准用于治疗具有 IDH1 或 IDH2 突变的 2 级神经胶质瘤患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/FDA-approves-vorasidenib-for-Grade-2-gliomas-with-IDH-mutations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/FDA-approves-vorasidenib-for-Grade-2-gliomas-with-IDH-mutations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1bcc813c-8bc8-4175-92d5-fdc0d58727c5 Tue, 06 Aug 2024 22:48:43 -0400 FDA approves vorasidenib for Grade 2 gliomas with IDH mutations
